infos.value: Would you feel better if Glaciela's corpse were at your feet?
She could not have escaped...could she?
Don't tell me you think we botched the plan...?
Well, I guess killing her would have worked out, too, though.
Then perhaps you would like to tell me why you did not do so.
Because Leonis and Hourne have officially become allies.
If Glaciela were to join that alliance, Wezette wouldn't stand a chance.
The alliance is already bad enough without her, if you ask me.
So the question becomes, how do we shatter that alliance?
I have been informed that Mont has fallen for Miss Mach√©rie of Hourne.
We can't let that interesting development go to waste now, can we? Hehehe.
I'll take that as a compliment.
